</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.72

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Math - Vectors
</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Converts vector direction from model to world space.
</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object '''vectorModelToWorld''' modelDir
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> modelDir: [[Array]] - vector direction in model space in format [x,y,z]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - vector direction in world space in format [x,y,z]
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value>Convert model space vector [0,-10,4] to world space; vector gets rotated according to _airplane: 
<code>_airplane [[vectorModelToWorld]] [0,-10,4];</code>
</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[vectorDir]], [[modelToWorld]], [[addForce]], [[addTorque]], [[vectorModelToWorldVisual]], [[vectorWorldToModel]], [[vectorWorldToModelVisual]], [[matrixMultiply]], [[matrixTranspose]]
